Anko kicks her opponent into the air then kicks again higher and jumps on their shoulders and spins them into the ground through rapid somersaults before getting off of them upon landing.

== Trivia ==
* The term {{translation|"ransha"|乱射}} is a play on the "riot shot", "random shooting", or "firing wildly".

[[es:Rueda Ferris de la Hoja]]
